channel.title: Normal attack emote help
channel.description:
Im using Bulby's 508 first of all.
Ok, so I think this is a pretty basic request, im pretty much a beginner you could say, and im pretty much stuck on this. Im trying to get the normal claw attack when I click attack on a npc without the special bar turned on, but i've tried editing PlayerWeapon.java, and when I open it, im completely stuck and i don't know what to do. I've looked at PlayerNPCCombat and PlayerCombat.java, but nothing in those help me. Can someone please explain how to do this???? Everytime I attack normally with these d claws I punch, but i want the claw attack.
(the claw emote id is 2068)

item.title: Normal attack emote help
item.dc:creator: @iamthegod iamthegod
item.description:
@iamthegod wrote:

I’ve found this d claws tut and this is put at the end of it

last but not least go into PlayerWeapon.java(bulby>players>items) and in there you will find the attack,block,walk, and run emotes aswell as the speed. change those to whatever you care to.

Code:
p.walkEmote = getWalkEmote(p.equipment[3]);
p.runEmote = getRunEmote(p.equipment[3]);
p.BlockEmote = getBlockEmote(p.equipment[3]);
p.standEmote = getStandEmote(p.equipment[3]);
p.attackEmote = getAttackEmote(p.equipment[3]);
p.attackDelay = getAttackDelay(p.equipment[3]);

how do I do this???

Read full topic
